L'Isle-sur-la-Sorgue.title: L'Isle-sur-la-Sorgue
L'Isle-sur-la-Sorgue.byline: L'Isle-sur-la-Sorgue is in the Vaucluse department of southern France.

L'Isle-aux-Coudres.title: L'Isle-aux-Coudres
L'Isle-aux-Coudres.byline: Isle-aux-Coudres is a municipality of the regional county municipality (RCM) of Charlevoix, in the administrative region of the Capitale-Nationale, on the north shore of the Saint-Laurent river, in Quebec, Canada.
